revised_title: Multipolar Hamiltonian in Radiation Theory: Derivation from Arbitrary Gauge
tldr: The authors demonstrate how to obtain the multipolar Hamiltonian from a Lagrangian expressed in an arbitrary gauge, rather than just the Coulomb gauge. They show that the new Lagrangian is independent of the initial choice of scalar potential and includes contributions from polarization, magnetization, and Rontgen currents.
